TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MdbDataFileEditor extends System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor

summary.span: 提供用于选择 Microsoft Access 数据库文件的设计时用户界面。

span.span: Provides a design-time user interface for selecting a Microsoft Access database file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象用于在设计时选择和编辑 Microsoft Access 数据库文件 (.mdb) 的 URL，然后将 URL 分配给控件属性。An object is used at design time to select and edit a URL for a Microsoft Access database file (.mdb), and then assign the URL to a control property. 例如，控件使用类在设计时设置的值属性。For example, the control uses the class at design time to set the value of the property. 使用特性将相关联的属性。Use the attribute to associate the with a property. 当在设计图面上编辑关联的属性时，设计器宿主调用方法。When the associated property is edited on the design surface, the designer host calls the method. 方法使用方法，这将依次显示用于选择 URL 的用户界面，然后返回用户选定的 URL。The method uses the method, which in turn displays a user interface for selecting the URL, and then returns the URL that is selected by the user. 方法指示的用户界面的显示样式。The method indicates the display style of the user interface. 从派生类来定义访问数据库 URL 属性的自定义编辑器。Derive a class from the to define a custom editor for an Access database URL property. 例如，派生的类可以重写方法，，然后调用方法使用自定义或值。For example, a derived class can override the method, and then call the method with a custom or value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将相关联的实例类包含在自定义控件的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to associate an instance of the class with a property that is contained within a custom control. 当您编辑设计图面上的控件属性类提供了用户界面，可选择和编辑属性值的访问数据库文件名称。When you edit the control property on the design surface, the class provides the user interface to select and edit an Access database file name for the property value. [!code-csharp[WebDesigner.MdbDataFileEditor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebDesigner.MdbDataFileEditor/CS/simplecontrolwithfilename.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebDesigner.MdbDataFileEditor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebDesigner.MdbDataFileEditor/VB/simplecontrolwithfilename.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Caption As String
protected: virtual property System::String ^ Caption { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取要在选择对话框中显示的标题。

span.span: Gets the caption to display on the selection dialog box.

value.span: 要在选择对话框中显示的标题文本。

span.span: The caption text to display on the selection dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符串由方法调用时方法，用于在设计时向用户显示 URL 选择对话框。The string is used by the method when calling the method, which displays the URL selection dialog box to the user at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Filter As String
protected: virtual property System::String ^ Filter { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取编辑器的 URL 筛选选项，用于对 URL 选择对话框中出现的项进行筛选。

span.span: Gets the URL filter options for the editor, which is used to filter the items that appear in the URL selection dialog box.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示对话框的一个或多个 URL 筛选选项。

span.span: A string that represents one or more URL filter options for the dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可供方法调用时方法，用于在设计时向用户显示 URL 选择对话框。The property is used by the method when calling the method, which displays the URL selection dialog box to the user at design time. 属性默认值，表示为对话框中的两个 URL 筛选器： 一个用于 Microsoft Access 数据库文件 (\*.mdb)，另一个用于所有文件 (\*。\*)。The property default value indicates two URL filters for the dialog box: one for Microsoft Access database files (\*.mdb) and another for all files (\*.\*). 若要指定自定义筛选器字符串，从派生类类并重写属性返回的自定义筛选器字符串。To specify a custom filter string, derive a class from the class and override the property to return the custom filter string. 筛选器字符串包含一个或多个筛选器选项。A filter string contains one or more filter options. 每个筛选器选项包含说明的筛选器后, 接垂直条 (|) 和筛选器模式。Each filter option contains a description of the filter, followed by the vertical bar (|) and the filter pattern. 由竖线分隔不同的筛选选项的字符串。The strings for different filtering options are separated by the vertical bar. 下面是一个包含两个筛选器选项的筛选器字符串的示例：The following is an example of a filter string that contains two filter options: "`Microsoft Access Databases (*.mdb)|*.mdb|All Files (*.*)|*.*`"."`Microsoft Access Databases (*.mdb)|*.mdb|All Files (*.*)|*.*`". 通过用分号分隔的筛选器模式，可以在筛选器选项中指定多个筛选器模式。You can specify several filter patterns in a filter option by separating the filter patterns with semicolons. 下面是筛选器字符串，其中第一个筛选器选项指定两个筛选器模式的示例：The following is an example of a filter string in which the first filter option specifies two filter patterns: "`Custom Database Files (*.db1; *.db2)|*.db1;*.db2|All Files (*.*)|*.*`"."`Custom Database Files (*.db1; *.db2)|*.db1;*.db2|All Files (*.*)|*.*`".
